author: rafaellopesdesa
body:
This is the ECAL+EGM part of the preparation for the re-miniAOD in view of the ECAL gain switch problem (and others)

Attn: @Sam-Harper @argiro @gpetruc 

Quick description: The PR is separated in a few parts. The RecoEcal files create a new collection of supercluster based on a corrected rechit collection. The RecoEgamma/ElectronPhotonProducers and RecoEgamma/ElectronElectronProducers files replace the superclusters in existing electrons and photons with the corrected ones. The RecoParticleFlow, RecoEgamma/EgammaIsolationAlgos and RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification files link the properties of the old electrons and photons to the new ones. The files in RecoEgamma/EgammaTools control the modifications. We have an example of the whole sequence in RecoEgamma/EgammaTools/test/miniaod_PAT.py where the processes to be loaded and customization to be used can be found.
title: Mitigation of the ECAL gain switch problem for re-miniAOD
